snippet.title: Arelite Core New Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam in 2016, Arelite Core is a brand new windows JRPG from Dragon Slumber.

Facebook ►► https://www.facebook.com/DragonSlumberGames
Twitter ►► https://twitter.com/dragon_slumber
Website ►► http://www.arelitecore.com

The age of heroes is passed, yet an ancient evil rises again. Join Karden, a master blacksmith journeying across the world to perfect his craft, forced to confront the dark entity Talameq to destroy it once and for all.
